revised_title: High Power Microscopy of Insect Scales and Radiant Energy Conversion
tldr: Dr. Royston-Pigott discovered the molecular structure of insect scales using high power microscopy, revealing beaded villi covered with chenille or velvet pile. This observation opens a new field of research. Additionally, the author discusses the conversion of radiant energy into sonorous vibrations, with various experiments and findings related to the topic.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Insect Anatomy
